TopicTitle: Missing the parts from asteroid redirect mission

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I have a weird issue: I started a new career when 24.2 came out, and noticed today that every node which should contain the new parts (like CLAW) etc. is empty. I am totally baffled why that is the case - I started a new career (science +cash) and assumed the parts would be available.

The mods are adding parts / UI like Spaceplane Parts, Fairings or Chatterer, but no technode altering mod like BSTM was used.

Do you have the folder KSP/GameData/NASAmission/? That's where all those parts are located. If not, you'll need to check the game files through Steam or copy over those parts from another copy of the game on your computer.
Do you have Cacteye? It deleted all the stock parts for me.

Do you have Cacteye? It deleted all the stock parts for me.

No, I did not install that mod.

I will try to find the KSP/GameData/NASAmission/ folder this evening, maybe I have delted it when deleting some older mods Thanks for the tip!
So you started a new career and the parts weren't there? Try opening a sandbox game and see if they are there.
